# H28ooitaslides
This is a slide preparation for presentation and panel discussion of [Japanese domestic Helicobacter conference in 2016](http://www.c-linkage.co.jp/jshr22/En/E_index.html).
The panel disscussion is about eradication of _H.pylori_ in Japanese children and teenagers. 
My topic is about side effects and safety of metronidazole in the usage of triple therapy.
